bibl.title: The Christian Liturgical Papyri: An Introduction
bibl.seg: Ágnes T. Mihálykó, The Christian Liturgical Papyri: An Introduction = Studien zu Antike und Christentum. 114.
Tübingen, Mohr Siebeck, 2019, xvi-451 pp., figg. ISBN 978-3-16-155786-6. €89.

Revised version of a PhD dissertation, Univ. of Oslo, 2017. - 1. Introduction. - 2. The Coptic Liturgy: Sources and History. - 3. Dating Liturgical Papyri. - 4. Provenance. - 5. The Materiality of Liturgical Papyri. - 6. Uses of Liturgical Papyri. - 7. Genres, Manuscripts, and Their Uses. - 8. Languages of the Liturgy. - 9. Writing the Christian Liturgy in Egypt. - Appendix: Table of Liturgical Papyri. - Glossary. Bibliography. Index.
C.R. par Maxwell E. Johnson, JThS 72 (2021) pp. 453-454.
